title: I'm sick of your bullshit matchmaking
body:
http://puu.sh/g03jz/fa28f3d313.jpg

No matter what I do, I have NO CONTROL over how my teammates play. Stop pairing me with people who have no idea how to play and that enjoy getting caught etc. making it impossible for me to do anything. Now your stupid LP systems assumes I "deserve" to lose more LP and gain less.
